entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Altona
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:15 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Clearing early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 28. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow this evening. Clearing overnight. Blowing snow after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight then diminishing to 20. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 23.
